message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $7,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counteroffer at $6,800.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $6,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $7,200.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and am willing to move forward. My counteroffer is $7,000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $7,000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $7,300.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to counteroffer at $7,100.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $7,100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $7,250.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $7,150.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $7,150. I'm willing to offer it to you for $7,275.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers and have carefully considered our negotiation. I would like to counteroffer at $7,200.
